attributes.action: Stop supermarkets pushing pubs out of business as they have high street traders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pubs are going the same way as buchers and small corner shops. The price of alcohol in supermarkets is so low that pubs are haveing trouble serviving. Now with the smoking ban on its way we are going to have to servive another hit. Children are useing the cheap prices in the supermarkets as they can afford there prices and causing alcohol fueld trouble. Keep pubs and children from alcoholic harm.
